scripts.dev: concurrently 'cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--inspect" next dev' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern"' 'chokidar "src/utils/**/*.js" --ignore "src/utils/manual/**" --initial --silent --command "pnpm exec node src/config/manage-globals.mjs"' 'sass --watch --style=compressed --quiet src/assets/scss/:src/assets/css/'
scripts.tev: concurrently 'cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--inspect" IS_TURBO=true next dev --turbo' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern"' 'chokidar "src/utils/**/*.js" --ignore "src/utils/manual/**" --initial --silent --command "pnpm exec node src/config/manage-globals.mjs"' 'sass --watch --style=compressed --quiet src/assets/scss/:src/assets/css/'
scripts.watch: concurrently 'next lint || true' 'prettier "../**/*" --write --no-editorconfig --config ".prettierrc" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --log-level silent --check || true' 'chokidar "../**/*" --silent --command "prettier \"{path}\" --write --no-editorconfig --config \".prettierrc\" --ignore-unknown --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern"' 'chokidar "src/utils/**/*.js" --ignore "src/utils/manual/**" --initial --silent --command "pnpm exec node src/config/manage-globals.mjs"' 'sass --watch --style=compressed --quiet src/assets/scss/:src/assets/css/'
